name: Memory Game (Torima)
description:
Classic Memory (Concentration) game
Flip cards to match pairs,match all cards to win the level.
Torima Studio
http://torima.biz/
- Game/Level design,programming and UI by Ivan Komnenovic
http://ikomnen.weebly.com/
- Music by Eva Zlatkovic
https://soundcloud.com/alinore
- Graphics by Vicki Wenderlich
http://www.gameartguppy.com/
- Fonts by Ray Larabie
http://typodermicfonts.com/

Game is mostly suitable for kids,but older players are welcome too.
Six different levels in total with random shuffled cards so it can be played over and over again.

You can try free web version here on itch.io also.
http://torima.itch.io/memory-game

cheers
Torima Studio
